title: Drawing, "Sketches for scene 1 and 2 of the cartoon for cotton printing: The History of Henry IV [L'Histoire de Henri IV]", ca. 1820
inscribed: Inscription in pencil in the artist's hand: "groupe/ coin a droite/ repare ager/ la coin a gauche/ du bas" (right center) and quotation from Voltaire's text (bottom left and right).
description: Scene from Voltaire's epic "Henriade". The entrance of Henry IV into Paris, approaching on horseback the Cathedral of Notre Dame, his subjects kneeling before him. (Canto X, lines 512-514).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches for scene 1 and 2 of the cartoon for cotton printing: The History of Henry IV [L'Histoire de Henri IV]", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pencil on cream-colored paper. Gift of Bridget Mahon. 1898-21-21-b.
